approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified address.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and adds them to the specified owner's balance.

changeUnlockTime.description: Sets a new unlock time for the token.

allowPrecirculation.description: Allows the specified address to participate in precirculation.

disallowPrecirculation.description: Disallows the specified address from participating in precirculation.

changeController.description: Changes the controller of the contract to a new address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to represent the token.

getUnlockTime.description: Returns the current unlock time for the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified address.

isPrecirculationAllowed.description: Checks if the specified address is allowed to participate in precirculation.

controller.description: Returns the address of the current controller.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend from the owner's account.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the specified unlock time.
